channel.title: public policy on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in public policy on ERIC WANG

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - What is data science at the national level ?
item.description: Central french administration is a great opportunity to have a macro view of how to drive ideas to reality. Combine it with the experience of local administration, you reinforce a thinking to lead and design digital tools for answers. I design and produce data insight for public policy evaluation.

item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - How to urban plan with data science ?
item.description: At the ministry of Environment and more especially at the local administration of Val d'Oise department, I learn to manage and to tackle local housing policy.

item.title: @MINISTRY OF INTERIOR - How to graphic design at the ministry of interior ?
item.description: At the ministry of Interior and more specically at the Border Police, I produce quantity of infographics to highlight weekly report for the ministry cabinet.

item.title: @SORBONNE UNIVERISTY - Does microcredit embolden education ?
item.description: Master's thesis written during my master's degree in applied economics at Sorbonne University.
